title: Semiotic Approaches for Enhancing Critical Argumentation: Project-Based Debate Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Argumentative Structures and Linguistic Expression Skills
context.additional_context: Encouraging participation through smartphone-based collaborative tools and role-rotation systems

learning_goals: Learners can systematically construct logical arguments using various semiotic tools (concept maps, argument maps, etc.)
Learners can analyze and evaluate multi-perspective argumentation through role-playing (protagonist/antagonist/mediator)
Learners can enhance reflective thinking skills by performing a 5-stage discussion cycle (preparation-argument-refutation-synthesis-reflection)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
